title: Exhibit Spans More Than 45 Years of Friendship by Former HAS Classmates (University of Hartford) ...
text: ( Source : University of Hartford ) Between 1968 and 1972 , four classmates at the University of Hartford's Hartford Art School (HAS) forged a lifelong friendship. In the more than four decades since they met as young art students, all have had
